      • fillRowInPCU

        public void fillRowInPCU​(long originZone,
                         org.ojalgo.structure.Access1D<Double> pcuODTripFlowRates)
        Fill a row of trip values in PCU. If the mode of the matrix has a PCU greater than 1, the mode based trips are less than the provided PCU trips
        Parameters:
        originZone - origin zone
        pcuODTripFlowRates - od trip flow rate in PCU/h
